author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HUMBERTO LIKELY TO MERGE WITH A FRONTAL BOUNDARY TONIGHT... ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS TO CONTINUE ACROSS THE WESTERN ATLANTIC COASTLINE THROUGH THE WEEK...
summary: ...HUMBERTO LIKELY TO MERGE WITH A FRONTAL BOUNDARY TONIGHT... ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS TO CONTINUE ACROSS THE WESTERN ATLANTIC COASTLINE THROUGH THE WEEK... As of 5:00 AM AST Wed Oct 01 the center of Humberto was located near 35.8, -67.3 with movement NE at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 979 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Humberto (AT3/AL082025)
